name: Cup of Sugar (WIP)
description:
Cup of Sugar is a visual story based on a true story. Set on a summer day in rural Canada in 1982, a mother asks her child to ride down the road to get a cup of sugar.

So, pet a cow, grab your banana seated bike, your measuring cup, and travel down the dusty road to get some sugar from the neighbour - but beware, once you leave that door, who knows what else you'll find along the way.

((Game is currently in a demo state with the first few minutes of play available to try ... more soon!))

A game created by: BunSquad
Programming and implementation: bunni
Writer and Narrative Design: Paige Maylott (Deadrabbitgirl)
Art direction, sprites, and intercuts: Nenkaii
Background art: ShatteredReality

(Contains: LGBTQ2SA+ and specifically transition-based metaphor)
(TRIGGERS: Contains themes of bigotry, mental trauma, and death)
